text: sinni maalu Yallih kacanuu kee kay leeda edde gurrusak usun sinni Nafsih Yalli dudda-le galto keenih elle yacayuwaam diggi haak Asmat luk yaceeh yan marih ceelallo, Bustaanay maggo cooxley Baaxok fayya-le Aracal yaniy maggo Rob elle Radek caxâ mixu Namma marduufuh Baaha, kaxxa Rob kaal Rade weeh dago Rob kaal Rada way caxâ mixu Namma marduufuh Baahah inna, tamannaah Acwa Yallah caglise marih Acwa Yalli Raabitaah dirribisah tambay taqanxay, Yalli isin Abba haytaanam yabali kinni
